title: New UI
body: I downloaded the new UI and its wonderful, except for one thing. It strains my horrible laptop way too much. It gets to the point where in Champ Select my game will literally freeze for 5 minutes where I cant do anything until League DC's me. Is there a way to reduce the UI or rollback?

replies.body:
The Beta Client can run pretty poorly on lower-spec machines at the moment. I'd definitely recommend using the *Legacy Client* for now to avoid these issues.  As *Duckeroo* mentioned, you can access the *Legacy Client* at any time at the login screen, as shown below:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.

You can switch to the legacy client at any time in the login menu... look at the bottom right-ish area for "launch legacy client" or something of the sort, and click on that. You'll be in the legacy login menu, login through there, and there you go.
